name: Elav (C64)
description:
Elav (C64)

Elav is a Commodore 64 game developed by Ice Team in collaboration with Ready64 forum and released in 2006 for the Minigame Competition where it reached the 3° position.

This is born for being a Rampage clone with only 4KB of space (using music too), so with a space that is less than a 1/10 of normal C64 game.

You have 10 levels to clean from the buildings.

The game is PAL/NTSC compatible.

The chars graphics of this game was made using the Little Sara Sister Construction Kit is  available on https://iceteam.itch.io/lss-game-contruction-kit by using the special 40x25 map generation.

Source code is inside the zip with even the Vice images of sprites program used for make them.
